plot: Retelling of the 'Ramayana' tale of Ansuya, who, with her husband Atri, shelters Rama, Seeta and Lakshmana during their banishment from Ayodhya. Notorious for a nude shot of Sakina (Ansuya).
title: Mahasati Ansuya
plot_es: Retelling of the 'Ramayana' tale of Ansuya, who, with her husband Atri, shelters Rama, Seeta and Lakshmana during their banishment from Ayodhya. Notorious for a nude shot of Sakina (Ansuya).
plot_en: Retelling of the 'Ramayana' tale of Ansuya, who, with her husband Atri, shelters Rama, Seeta and Lakshmana during their banishment from Ayodhya. Notorious for a nude shot of Sakina (Ansuya).
